experience.title: Strategy & Program Manager
experience.description: • Leading a team of 17 associates of 7 cities• Implementing stringent Planning & Control measures for high risk vendors minimizing delivery defaults

experience.title: Strategy Intern
experience.description: • Presented case studies and strategic recommendations for restructuring of the diagnostic test discount methods, resulting in a 15% increase in test bookings• Increased AOV of generic medicines by 7-8% on a DoD basis through targeted strategies and initiatives• Implemented and optimized the "Frequently Bought Together" feature, resulting in a 15% increase in conversion rates and a 5% boost in revenue
experience.description_html: • Presented case studies and strategic recommendations for restructuring of the diagnostic test discount methods, resulting in a 15% increase in test bookings• Increased AOV of generic medicines by 7-8% on a DoD basis through targeted strategies and initiatives• Implemented and optimized the "Frequently Bought Together" feature, resulting in a 15% increase in conversion rates and a 5% boost in revenue <!---->

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Conducted an in-depth research on customer acquisition and retention strategies adopted by corporates, analyzing data from companies across various industries• Focused on KPIs like CAC in relation to other metrics, such as CLV and ROI, to gain a better understanding of the company's performance. Identified cost-saving opportunities by reducing CAC by 15% and improving CLV by 10%• Compared acquisition marketing strategies with brand awareness initiatives, analyzing data from 50 campaigns. Identified that acquisition marketing campaigns resulted in a 25% higher conversion rate compared to brand awareness campaigns
experience.description_html: • Conducted an in-depth research on customer acquisition and retention strategies adopted by corporates, analyzing data from companies across various industries• Focused on KPIs like CAC in relation to other metrics, such as CLV and ROI, to gain a better understanding of the company's performance. Identified cost-saving opportunities by reducing CAC by 15% and improving CLV by 10%• Compared acquisition marketing strategies with brand awareness initiatives, analyzing data from 50 campaigns. Identified that acquisition marketing campaigns resulted in a 25% higher conversion rate compared to brand awareness campaigns

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Studied Indian Unicorn Startups in depth and their impact on economy, growth, funding pattern and job creation • Examined data of Unicorn of other developed countries and studied their trend in comparison with Indian Unicorn

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Strategic analysis of the Shopping Malls in India, identified factors responsible for their continuous decline in past • Explored future prospect of shopping malls, planned and recommended strategies to mitigate online competition • Examined the challenges faced by the malls in recent times like growing e-commerce, lack of customer insight, etc
